isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - INTRODUCTION - Engine Description - Chassis Mounted Air-To-Air Cooler

svcproc.title: Chassis Mounted Air-To-Air Cooler
svcproc.para: The T 444E diesel engine is equipped with a charge air cooling (CAC) system. The cooler is chassis mounted adjacent to the radiator. Air from the turbocharger is pushed through a network of heat exchanging tubes before entering the intake manifold. Outside air flowing over the fins and tubes serves to cool the air charge. The resulting cooled intake air is denser than the compressed (warmed) air, allowing for improved fuel/air ratio in the cylinders during the combustion process. The results are improved emission control and increased power output.
